short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides the best quotes in a new tab with a beautiful background that can be inspirational and change your life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides the best quotes in a new tab with a beautiful background that can be inspirational and change your life.
Replace your new tab with a beautiful homepage featuring a random inspirational quote to keep you motivated and inspired every day.
Ability to search quotes from a specials author or category.
Ability to select the quote categories from the setting part 
Ability to set the background image category or your own image from the setting part 
✓ Completely free
✓ Working offline
